title: Computer Support for Knowledge Management
description: Methods and techniques that computer-based systems can provide to make the management of knowledge and information in digital form easier for the user. Emphasis on support for knowledge-intensive activities performed by users. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/CSCÂ 581.
prerequisites: CSC/CPE 480 or CSC/CPE 484 or consent of instructor
